text:
Edmond Baraffe (19 October 1942 – 19 April 2020) was a French professional football striker and manager. He was born in Annoeulin, France. He played for the national team from 1964 to 1966. He also played for Toulouse. He managed Le Touquet from 1985 to 1989.
Baraffe died on 19 April 2020, aged 77.
